name: wirepair's RE'ing & Security Bloggie blog
body:
### Punking PunkBuster Presentation

OK folks, finally got around to releasing my slides from [44con](http://www.44con.com). Probably the most interesting part of this talk was that I decided to create my own presentation framework using [three.js](http://threejs.org). The slides themselves probably won't make much sense, so if you run a conference and want me to present at it, hit me up at [twitter](https://twitter.com/_wirepair).

I got glowing reviews such as "doesn't suck" and "only drooled a little." As such, I believe it to be a pretty entertaining talk for most attendees.

Use the left/right arrow keys to transition from slides. No, you can't transition during an animation, so wait for it to finish. Check out the slides hosted thanks to github!

[Punking PunkBuster By Isaac Dawson](http://wirepair.github.com/pbslides/slides.html)

If you want just the framework check out my [ThreePrez](https://github.com/wirepair/ThreePrez/) repository.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
